title: New Girls
name: School girls
dialog: There will be new students on campus very soon!

name: School girls
dialog: I wonder what they'll be like...I'm so CURIOUS~

name: Hottie
dialog: You will know that when they arrive~ But focus!

name: Hottie
dialog: Get back to class! School is still in session, remember?!

name: School girls
dialog: Okay, okay...
The corridor suddenly turns into silence.

name: Hottie
dialog: Wait a second.
Are you talking to me?

name: Hottie
dialog: Don't act innocent with me. You're the only person skipping class now.
So... What do you want, Hottie?

name: Hottie
dialog: Why are you so nervous? Are you afraid of me?
NO!!!

name: Hottie
dialog: I know you also heard about the new students, but I'm really busy right now...

name: Hottie
dialog: I haven't even had time to prepare school supplies for them...

name: Hottie
dialog: It's worrying me. Can you please do me a favor?
With the supplies...?

name: Hottie
dialog: Huh? What else could I be referring to?

name: Hottie
dialog: What are you waiting for?
Umm, I'll be right back!

name: Hottie
dialog: Still so shy~
When I had almost reached the Shopping Street, I overheard an argument.
From a distance, I could see a little girl in black standing in the center of a crowd.

name: Shop Owner
dialog: Are you leaving without paying? I'm not giving out all those for free~

name: Jacob
dialog: Sorry... I didn't know the rules...

name: Shop Owner
dialog: You can't leave without paying. What about working in my shop as payment?

name: Shop Owner
dialog: You already have a wing and horns, so you don't even need to pay for cosplay costumes~

name: Shop Owner
dialog: …Well, you still need to buy another wing.
Horns, single-wing... Jacob?!
Make way, please.
I'm her brother, sir. How much did she eat? I'll pay for her.

name: Shop Owner
dialog: Tch, look what the cat dragged in...
Hey! At least I have my own picture! And I'm supposed to be the main character!

name: Shop Owner
dialog: Not on this street.

name: Shop Owner
dialog: Minions, get him! There's nobody protecting him now~

name: Jacob
dialog: Who said that?! Brother, let me help you!

name: Shop Owner
dialog: Ug---ahhhhhhhh! She's stronger than I thought! If… if she worked in my store...
Get your mind out of the gutter!
We meet again, shadowbringer---

name: Shop Owner
dialog: Hey, stop right there! It's almost copyright infringement!
Sorry! Forget that... The girl of shadow-- Jacob~

name: Jacob
dialog: ??? You know my name??

name: Jacob
dialog: You claimed to be my brother...Now I doubt your mental competency...
Seriously! We actually met before!

name: Jacob
dialog: Really??? I don't remember that.
In Discipline Committee! You and Kratos... And the Philosopher's Stone...

name: Jacob
dialog: Kratos? Sorry… Doesn't ring a bell… But the Philosopher's Stone you mentioned...

name: Jacob
dialog: Oh! My sister has arrived!
Following the direction of Jacob's finger, I saw a pure white figure.
White hair, white dress, white wing,  white everything… With a face similar to Jacob's...
I knew your twin would show up together! It's Esau.

title: Sister？
name: Esau
dialog: Jacob, I'm back!
In a blink of an eye, Esau reached Jacob.

name: Jacob
dialog: Sister…don't hug me too tight, it's embarrassing!
Uhh…

name: Esau
dialog: Oh, sorry, I didn't notice there's someone else here...
You also lost your memory?

name: Esau
dialog: Ah! You're the... "Senpai" we met before~
You... What are you doing here???

name: Esau
dialog: Chill out~

name: Esau
dialog: The only thing to do on a shopping street is shopping, right?~
Surely not for something else?

name: Esau
dialog: Don't worry, the Dire inside Jacob was defeated after the battle.

name: Esau
dialog: Now she's just her normal self~

name: Jacob
dialog: (NODDING) That's right!
But… she seems have forgotten what happened...

name: Esau
dialog: Isn't amnesia a normal thing in a story about school?

name: Jacob
dialog: Yeah, so don't worry about that too much.

name: Esau
dialog: Today we're preparing for our admission~
So YOU'RE the new students Hottie mentioned!
But I'm still worried because Jacob doesn't seem to know much about normal life...

name: Esau
dialog: Don't worry, I can catch Jacob up to speed!

name: Esau
dialog: Let's see...new stationery, school bag...

name: Esau
dialog: Jacob has everything she needs for school~
Suddenly, the twins were engulfed by the stuff Esau brought along.
This is too much! Jacob couldn't even use one-tenth of it...

name: Esau
dialog: Listen, my sister deserves the best gear!

name: Jacob
dialog: Sister, I also got something for you...
Jacob's words were drowned out by a noise.

name: Angry Shop Owners
dialog: Stop! You fraud!

name: Angry Shop Owners
dialog: That's not money at all! Return all our merchandise!

name: Angry Shop Owners
dialog: Stop right there! It's the white wing girl!
White wing??...!!! That's Esau!

name: Esau
dialog: Huh? Me? I've paid everything in full!

name: Esau
dialog: They look really angry. Let's calm them down first~
Stop fighting! I'll pay for them!
(Gasping)... Just another nonsense battle...

name: Jacob
dialog: Thanks for helping us out a second time~

name: Esau
dialog: That's what we call generosity~
Besides thanking me, you still owe me an explanation for the "fraud" accusation.
Have you been scamming people to get what Jacob needs?

title: Take Flight
dialog: I mean… This looks like money from a board game.

name: Esau
dialog: Yes! Exactly~

name: Esau
dialog: But I still owe you a lot~ I might need to accept 10 internship offers at the same time to pay for all those bills...
I understand that but... You purchased way too much!

name: Esau & Jacob
dialog: We can't help ourselves!!!
But you're not the ones who are paying the bill!

name: Jacob
dialog: Wait... Sister, I've also got something for you~

name: Esau
dialog: ? A gift for me?

name: Jacob
dialog: From me to you!
The girl held out her hands to show a beautiful ring.
It was a very unique necklace.
It comprised two wings with white and black feathers, spreading like they were preparing to take flight...

name: Jacob
dialog: Sister, the design surely suits us a lot.

name: Jacob
dialog: I hope we can fly up high someday… Just like this necklace...

name: Esau
dialog: Don't worry, the time is coming!

name: Esau
dialog: We're about to join Yume Academy~

name: Esau
dialog: With the protection of the Academy, we'll be able to fly however we want~

name: Saint
dialog: Please stop standing in the middle of the road...
Your timing is awful!

name: Saint
dialog: But I'm here as the Discipline Member!

name: Saint
dialog: I heard from some of the students about the chaos in the Shopping Street, and apparently you're the ones to blame.

name: Saint
dialog: So please come with me… You too, Senpai!

name: Passerby
dialog: Weird, I thought Saint is no longer a Discipline Member?

name: Passerby
dialog: I heard some rumors that she joined D.E.F...

name: Saint
dialog: What did you just say?

name: Passerby
dialog: Umm, we should be going...
Well, Saint… The chaos is already settled, and they're...

name: Esau
dialog: We're not going anywhere with a stranger! Jacob, we're going home!

name: Jacob
dialog: Okay!

name: Saint
dialog: I apologize in advance, but this is my duty! Capture them!
Why can't we talk things over before a fight breaks out?!
This is... (gasp)…the third fight I had this past hour.
I'm just here to shop for Hottie!

name: Esau
dialog: Jacob! Now!

name: Jacob
dialog: Okay!
I felt a fierce gust of wind.
The sunlight spread on the street through their wings.
At that moment, no one could imagine they were two girls.
The Twin Wings, Esau and Jacob, are destined to be one until the very end.
You can't just leave me behind!! I cannot deal with this mess all by myself!

name: Esau
dialog: Sorry, Senpai!

name: Jacob
dialog: We'll meet again very soon~ I will save my apologies till then~

name: Esau & Jacob
dialog: Bye-bye, Senpai~

title: Hunter…person?
name: Campus Announcement
dialog: Attention, please!

name: Campus Announcement
dialog: Large packs of wild Hunters have been observed on Campus, and students who try to pet them have been attacked.

name: Campus Announcement
dialog: The Student Council wishes to remind students that wild Hunters may be dangerous, so please don't pet them!

name: Jacob
dialog: Look, it's a Hunter~

name: Esau
dialog: Where is it? Where is it?

name: Jacob
dialog: It's fur looks so soft…

name: Esau
dialog: Here, kitty, kitty…

name: Hunters
dialog: Grrr…meow!

name: Jacob
dialog: Are you alright?

name: Esau
dialog: It's only a scratch, I'll be fine in no time!

name: Jacob
dialog: I think someone is in that bush…look it, it's moving!

name: Esau
dialog: Those ears! Another Hunter must be hiding there!

name: Esau
dialog: I will pet it this time!

name: Jacob
dialog: Okay, okay, just control yourself or it will run away.

name: Catgirl
dialog: Wh-what do you want?

name: Jacob
dialog: This doesn't look like a Hunter…a Hunter-person?

name: Mio
dialog: The name's Mio!

name: Jacob
dialog: Hunter…Mio?

name: Mio
dialog: No!!!

name: Mio
dialog: Grrr…no touching!

name: Esau
dialog: It's so warm…and soft…

name: Mio
dialog: What are you doing with my tail?

name: Esau
dialog: Awww, don't run!

name: Mio
dialog: Grrrr…take one step closer, and Mio will scratch you!

name: Esau
dialog: I don't think Mio likes us…

name: Jacob
dialog: Hey, look at this!

name: Mio
dialog: (Gulps) Fish…

name: Mio
dialog: (Turns away) No, it takes way more than a measly treat to win Mio over!

name: Jacob
dialog: Not even for Tuna?

name: Mio
dialog: (Gulps) Tuna…

name: Rumpy
dialog: Meow! Meow! (Tuna! I want Tuna!)

name: Mio
dialog: Quiet! Don't lose your cool!

name: Rumpy
dialog: (Sad) Mreow…

name: Esau
dialog: I just want to make a deal with you, Mio~

name: Jacob
dialog: …Isn't that Dire's line?

name: Esau
dialog: Who cares?

name: Esau
dialog: Mio, if you let us pet you, we'll bring you to a place where you can have all the tuna you want!

name: Mio
dialog: …Really?

name: Esau
dialog: Of course! There will be all types of treats, and even catnip!

name: Mio
dialog: …Promise?

name: Esau & Jacob
dialog: Promise!

title: Nomnomnomnom
name: Passerby 1
dialog: Look, there's a group of Hunters!

name: Passerby 2
dialog: Their tail looks so soft…I want to pet them…

name: Passerby 3
dialog: Didn't you hear the announcement? They scratch anyone that comes close!

name: Passerby 1
dialog: So how come Esau and Jacob are surrounded by them?

name: Passerby 2
dialog: Who is that girl with cat ears anyway? I don't remember seeing her anywhere on campus…

name: Passerby 3
dialog: I don't know, and I don't want to be late for class too! Let's go!

name: Jacob
dialog: …A quick question, what is the last time you had a proper meal?

name: Mio
dialog: (Nomnomnomnomnom) Fish…Mio haven't ate fish…in quite a while…

name: Esau
dialog: She's cute even when eating!
Crack!!!

name: Jacob
dialog: Oh no, Mio broke a plate!

name: Esau
dialog: Let's get out of here before she notices!

name: Mio
dialog: Meow???

name: Sonya
dialog: Who did that!!

name: Esau
dialog: It's too late…

name: Mio
dialog: Meow…

name: Mio
dialog: Mio didn't mean to…

name: Mio
dialog: Fish…yummy…

name: Sonya
dialog: Did you like what I made?

name: Mio
dialog: Meow! (Yes!)

name: Mio
dialog: Rumpy too!

name: Rumpy
dialog: Meow~~~~~

name: Sonya
dialog: I'll let it slide this time, but don't do it again, okay?

name: Jacob
dialog: Wow, I thought she was going to scold us for sure…

name: Esau
dialog: That's what happened back when we didn't finish the Omelette she made…

name: Jacob
dialog: Everyone love Hunters…

name: Sonya
dialog: If I remembered correctly,

name: Sonya
dialog: You weren't here to feast but to fight last time!

name: Sonya
dialog: I seem to remember a certain pair of twins offering to wash dishes as payment…

name: Sonya
dialog: Why not start now!

name: Esau
dialog: …Mio, do you have any money?

name: Mio
dialog: Meow? Money?

name: Jacob
dialog: Dishes it is then.

name: Sonya
dialog: Come over here!

name: Esau & Jacob
dialog: Looks like you will have to continue your tour without us…

name: Esau & Jacob
dialog: See you later, Mio!

title: New Home
name: Mio
dialog: Not all humans are bad...

name: Mio
dialog: Are you full, Rumpy?

name: Rumpy
dialog: Meow~~~~~(I want more!)

name: Mio
dialog: That male human was right…

name: Mio
dialog: He did not trick us…

name: Rumpy
dialog: Meow! Meow!

name: Mio
dialog: …! What is it?

name: Mio
dialog: It's the forest!

name: Psychic
dialog: Want to have a walk in the sun?

name: Psychic
dialog: But you will freeze in the cold weather outside…

name: Psychic
dialog: If Bud Elf didn't agree to let us stay in her greenhouse, we would have had a hard time in the winter…

name: Psychic
dialog: I wonder what happened to Rumpy after he left...
The door of the Animal Welfare club opened, and in came the Hunters.

name: Mio
dialog: Blooming flowers and thriving plants…this will be our new home!

name: Mio
dialog: Rumpy, scout the perimeter.

name: Mio
dialog: Others, gather as many materials as you can!

name: Hunters
dialog: Meow! (Roger that!)

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Hey! What are you doing in my garden?

name: Mio
dialog: Speed up!

name: Mio
dialog: Catch any fish you can find in that pond!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: My sedums! My Suzuka flowers!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Look what you have done!

name: Mio
dialog: Meow? Is this your territory?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Territory? This is not my territory: this is my garden, and those are my friends!

name: Mio
dialog: So we can't stay here…

name: Mio
dialog: Let's go, Rumpy…

name: Psychic
dialog: Rumpy! You're back! And those are…

name: Rumpy
dialog: Meow~Meow~

name: Psychic
dialog: Ooooh, those are your friends! And who is this?

name: Mio
dialog: The name is…Mio!

name: Mio
dialog: You looked after Rumpy…thank you.

name: Psychic
dialog: Are you a student of the Academy? Do you have a Dorm room?

name: Mio
dialog: I don't like "Dorms"…

name: Mio
dialog: Walls are bad, woods are good!

name: Psychic
dialog: Hunters like to roam freely…but you can't stay in this greenhouse either.

name: Psychic
dialog: But I know somewhere else that will suit you just fine!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Wait! …Can you promise not to destroy the environment?

name: Mio
dialog: Mio doesn't have a home…

name: Mio
dialog: So Mio will cherish everything if I have one!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: If you promise to be friends with every plant here…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: You'll be free to stay.

name: Rumpy
dialog: Meow!!

name: Mio
dialog: Really?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: I did borrow my garden to the Animal Welfare Club,

name: Bud Elf
dialog: and you are…animals, I guess, so I don't see why you can't stay here.

name: Psychic
dialog: Yay! Rumpy, Mio, welcome to your new home!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Welcome to Yume Academy!

name: Mio
dialog: Are the ones in the pond your friends too?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: They're not plants nor flowers, so no.

name: Mio
dialog: (Jumps in the pond)

name: Psychic
dialog: !! Stop, there are goldfish in there!

title: A Warm Welcome
dialog: I wonder if Hottie can spare someone else for this kind of job…
Who is the new-comer this time?

name: Aquaris
dialog: YOO-HOO! Good morning, Senpai!
Gah!! Oh, Aquaris, you scared me.
You could have given me a heart attack! What's the matter with you?!

name: Aquaris
dialog: I greeted you this way because I knew it was you, Senpai~

name: Aquaris
dialog: Did I scare you that much, Senpai? What a scaredy-cat.
Of course not! I'm…I have a problem I need to solve.

name: Aquaris
dialog: What is it? Maybe I can help you~
Things might get worse if I tell you...

name: Aquaris
dialog: Hmph, people always forget that I'm a Discipline Member! I don't cause trouble; I solve problems.
Well, if you're sure, prepare yourself for what I'm about to tell you.
After telling Aquaris what Hottie asked me to do, her expression changed.
Aquaris?

name: Aquaris
dialog: So... Senpai, are you going to visit the new student today?
Yes, but she might be someone we've met before.
Hottie didn't give me any details.

name: Aquaris
dialog: I see…Let me come with you!!!
Keep it down!! I thought you grew up a little.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Sorry, I was just too excited~

name: Aquaris
dialog: But I still want to be the first to meet the new girl!
Really? You're joining me without my permission…?
But... In this case, I might have someone to take the first hit if something goes wrong…

name: Aquaris
dialog: Were you saying something?
Nothing. You can go with me, but you're going the wrong way~

name: Aquaris
dialog: Oops!!

name: Aquaris
dialog: If I'm still in the same Academy, then this should be the Administration Office. How on earth can the new student be here?
I'm not sure, but this is the location Hottie gave me.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Senpai... Are you...?

name: Aquaris
dialog: …trying to lure me to the Student Union so they can punish me?
Aquaris, your imagination is good at making up stories...

name: Aquaris
dialog: Am I imagining things, or is this corridor extremely clean today?
Wow, I can even see my reflection in the floor! Whoever cleaned this must be a professional.

name: Aquaris
dialog: But who can it be? I've never met anyone on campus whose hobby is cleaning...
There she is...
Someone in a maid dress soon appeared before us.
On her face, a black ribbon covered her eyes...
P-President!!! Why are you here?!!!
All of a sudden, Aquaris became very alert and started speaking in an incredible pace, like she had been preparing for this moment for a long time.

name: Aquaris
dialog: I'm not skipping my patrol! I-It's all Senpai's fault!

name: Aquaris
dialog: He's so incompetent that he can't complete the patrol by himself!

name: Ithil
dialog: Oh really? I didn't realize there was a patrol that passes by my dorm.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Wait a minute, this is not the voice of the president…

name: Aquaris
dialog: (Raising her head) Oh no, it's Ithil!!

name: Ithil
dialog: Since you're already here, let's have a warm-up test.
Never thought you are the new student mentioned by Hottie…

name: Ithil
dialog: The "new girl" thing is just a cover-up...

name: Aquaris
dialog: (Woozily) So, I can be considered the receptionist of Ithil then?

name: Aquaris
dialog: Ouch! It hurts, but it's worth it. Just one more thing to brag about~

name: Ithil
dialog: You've broken into my dorm and made such a mess.

name: Ithil
dialog: Aquaris, you and Senpai are going to clean it up for me. Got a problem with that?

name: Aquaris
dialog: No, ma'am!
(Whisper) But I wasn't even part of the fight...
Oops, looks like Ithil heard me! Her death stare is so threatening…

name: Aquaris
dialog: Did you say something, Senpai?
Of course not... It's my duty to serve the Juniors, including Ithil!

title: Master Chef Ithil
name: Aquaris
dialog: What's keeping Ithil? I thought she left the cleaning to us…
Ithil was preparing afternoon tea.

name: Ithil
dialog: Here, take a rest.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Is this for me? I'm so honored!
That was a dumb question. By the way, Ithil is...

name: Aquaris
dialog: Ah, I've almost forgotten that Ithil is also a master in housework~

name: Aquaris
dialog: Maybe I should come more regularly and...

name: Aquaris
dialog: Ouch! Senpai, why did you hit me?!
I'm just waking an idiot from her daydream.

name: Ithil
dialog: As I said, the "new girl" thing is just a cover-up, I had no other choice.

name: Ithil
dialog: But as long as I'm dressed like this, I 'm still a maid, and it's my duty to prepare your afternoon tea.

name: Ithil
dialog: So, if you want to take a visit, I'm always available, but it will cost you some time to help clean my room~

name: Aquaris
dialog: Please let me pledge to you my undying fealty!

name: Valeera
dialog: I could hear Aquaris a mile away. Ithil, you should reconsider bullying youngsters as a hobby.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Valeera! You must be here to save me from this demon!

name: Ithil
dialog: So much for "undying fealty"...

name: Ithil
dialog: Valeera, why are you here?

name: Valeera
dialog: We're now preparing a feast to welcome you~

name: Ithil
dialog: (waves her away) It doesn't need to be this complicated...

name: Valeera
dialog: Regardless, we've almost finished preparations!

name: Valeera
dialog: Remember what happened when Mio and the Twins entered the Academy? This welcome is pretty simple compared to theirs~

name: Ithil
dialog: Wait a second, isn't it the responsibility of a maid to prepare a feast?
Ithil stopped speaking as comprehension dawned on her.

name: Ithil
dialog: …You haven't even done anything for the feast, am I right?

name: Valeera
dialog: You got us pretty good...

name: Valeera
dialog: We're here to invite the chef!

name: Ithil
dialog: I won't help you.

name: Ithil
dialog: You never helped me clean the table after any feast. I can already imagine how messy it will be after this one.

name: Valeera
dialog: That's not true. We tried to help!

name: Valeera
dialog: But you always refused our help, saying it's the duty of a maid!

name: Valeera
dialog: Just come with me~ Everyone is waiting for you~

name: Ithil
dialog: Stop acting like a spoiled child. It won't work.

name: Valeera
dialog: Sigh... Time for Plan B... Turin, get her!

name: Turin
dialog: Ithil, I apologize for what I'm about to do...

name: Ithil
dialog: I'll still win even if you bring more backup.

name: Turin
dialog: You're strong as always.

name: Valeera
dialog: (sobbing)... But I want to eat what you cook... Please~

name: Ithil
dialog: You're already an adult. Pick yourself up.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Valeera looks so cute when she act like this~

name: Aquaris
dialog: Ouch! Senpai, why did you hit me again?!
I'm saving you from Ithil!

name: Ithil
dialog: Well, it seems you're not leaving... Lead the way, before it gets too late.

name: Valeera
dialog: Great!!! You're the best chef in the world!

title: The Interrupted Feast
name: Aquaris
dialog: GLOMP... DISH ISH DELICIOSH!
Aquaris, you'd better wait until you swallow that food in your mouth before speaking.

name: Aquaris
dialog: (Gulp) This is so delicious!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Never knew Ithil is also a good cook!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Now I understand how perfect she is!
It is said that Ithil actually used to be a maid before she trained to become a Valkyrie.
But I never thought you could be bought off this easily...

name: Aquaris
dialog: What are you talking about?!

name: Aquaris
dialog: I've decided long ago to admire Ithil as my idol and learn from her!

name: Ithil
dialog: Is that so? Since you've said that, you can help me clean up the mess after the feast is over.

name: Aquaris
dialog: What? Again? Please don't bully me anymore…

name: Ithil
dialog: As a maid, you must be a master in all skills related to cleaning.

name: Ithil
dialog: Since you've decided to learn from me, you'd better start studying immediately.

name: Valeera
dialog: Ithil, this is enough already. We don't need this much service.
After Valeera spoke, Ithil paused.

name: Ithil
dialog: In my opinion, you totally deserve...
Before Ithil could finish her sentence, we were interrupted by a noise at the gate.

name: Quinie
dialog: This tastes so good!!!

name: Quinie
dialog: I've never eaten such a delicious meal!
Ugh, why is she here? She'll ruin all of this...

name: Aquaris
dialog: Quinie, you're interrupting our feast. It's not nice.

name: Quinie
dialog: But being polite will keep me from enjoying this food when it's fresh.

name: Quinie
dialog: This food belongs in my stomach!!
As Quinie went on and on, Ithil became more and more angry.
Aquaris, looks like you might have a partner to clean up the mess with tonight.
Before anyone could move, Quinie was caged in by three rather sharp table knives.

name: Quinie
dialog: That hurt! Why did you hit me?

name: Ithil
dialog: That's how I treat unwelcomed guests.

name: Quinie
dialog: It's not my fault. I can never resist the temptation of delicious food...

name: Valeera
dialog: Now what? We definitely can't eat here anymore...

name: Ithil
dialog: These are just daily dishes. I can cook you some more later.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Wait,are you leaving now? (looks around) What about this mess...?

name: Ithil
dialog: As a maid, it should be clear to you what should be done first.

name: Ithil
dialog: So I'm leaving the cleanup job to you and Senpai.
This is the last time I help Hottie welcome a "new" student…
I'm getting tired of this nonsense!

name: Ithil
dialog: Remember, clean this place well...

name: Ithil
dialog: I want it to be flawless when I return.

title: Phototaxis
name: Aquaris
dialog: YO-HO! Good morning~
Aquaris, it seems you're fully recovered. It's nice to know that you're well-rested~
What about Iron Fist? I hope she's ready too.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Please don't worry, Senpai~ Now I'm ready to go to school~
And because of that... We've prepared a new dorm for you~

name: Iron Fist
dialog: A new dorm? For me? Thank you, Senpai~
Iron Fist is still polite as usual... I hope everyone is like that...

name: Aquaris
dialog: Why is Senpai the one who takes the credit?

name: Aquaris
dialog: It was KongMing and I who prepared this room!
Uh... I didn't mean to take the credit...

name: Iron Fist
dialog: But I should still thank you anyway~

name: Iron Fist
dialog: I just need to show Aquaris and KongMing how grateful I am again~ Thanks for your effort.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Everything just looks like my old room~

name: Iron Fist
dialog: But... I hope the lighting could be better...
The room is obviously backlit, and the sunlight is blocked by the curtains.

name: Aquaris
dialog: This wasn't a mistake!

name: Aquaris
dialog: We did that so the room won't get so hot in the summer!

name: Aquaris
dialog: And by blocking the sunlight, we can minimize the influence Iron Fist will have because of it.
Am I missing something? Why Iron Fist has to avoid sunlight?

name: Aquaris
dialog: Senpai, you really should pay more attention to the details!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Have you even noticed that there is something different about Iron Fist?

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Uh? Do you mean this optimized prosthetic arm?

name: Iron Fist
dialog: I don't think it will malfunction because of sunlight~

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Please don't be worried.

name: Aquaris
dialog: No! It's not the prosthetic arm, but the...
After all, it doesn't make any sense to lock yourself inside such a dark room on a sunny day!
Even Iron Fist agrees that. So let's just get rid of these annoying curtains!

name: KongMing
dialog: Stop!
It's too late. The curtain is already drawn back.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: KongMing, are you here to see me? I'm so happy...

name: KongMing
dialog: ...Someone go and hold her down, please...

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Why? What's wrong?

name: KongMing
dialog: Iron Fist, don't you feel anything strange?

name: Iron Fist
dialog: No, I think everything is fine~
But... You're...

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Ouch!
After the sunlight shines the room, Iron Fist somehow keeps approaching the wall unintentionally... and she hits the wall.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: ...That hurts...

name: KongMing
dialog: Just as I predicted. The light is disturbing Iron Fist's sense of direction...
And that's why you keep the curtains closed?
So, Aquaris mentioned the bionic antennae and wings?

name: Aquaris
dialog: That's right. You're really "Helping" us here, Senpai!

name: KongMing
dialog: But I'm still trying to figure out the reason behind this.

name: KongMing
dialog: Maybe it's a side-effect, or another hidden function of the new prosthetic arm that is yet to be discovered...

name: KongMing
dialog: ...I'm afraid it's just Sivney's bad joke.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Sorry to worry you... I didn't know...

name: KongMing
dialog: No worries. I believe there's a lot of secrets we need to discover inside this new prosthetic arm.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Thank you...

title: Antennae
name: Aquaris
dialog: I would really want to see how you fly with these new gears~

name: Aquaris
dialog: And they said your antennae can help collect information from the battlefield?
Aquaris touches Iron Fist's antennae as she speaks.
But Iron Fist seems to be shocked by this, and her face is turning red.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Aquaris... Please... Please let go of my antennae...

name: Aquaris
dialog: Why do you react like this? I thought it's just something bionic...

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Right when you touched me, I received a lot more information than I thought.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Even my body... Acts weird because of this...
Enough, you're making this sound even more weird, Iron Fist.
Iron Fist looks insulted.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Senpai!!! Don't watch any strange videos again!
Huh??? Iron Fist... I didn't watch any...

name: KongMing
dialog: Alright, I think we should get outside.

name: KongMing
dialog: Iron Fist, it's time for you to show your new abilities!

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Okay, I can help you more after the upgrade! You'll soon know why!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Since you mentioned outside... Oh no! I didn't finish my patrol mission today!
Of course you skipped your work again...

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Aquaris, maybe you can ask Iron Fist for help!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Oh? Really?

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Of course. I can't wait to show you what I've got~

name: Aquaris
dialog: Just like asking someone to help with my homework~

name: Aquaris
dialog: Iron Fist, your dashes were amazing!

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Thanks to Sivney and Ithil...

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Oh! I haven't properly thanked Ithil for that~

name: KongMing
dialog: Now you can find Ithil easier than before. Just wait for her to come in a place that needs cleaning.
Maybe Aquaris can help us...

name: Aquaris
dialog: Huh? I-I... I still got a patrol mission to work on!

name: Iron Fist
dialog: I think I can help you with that~

name: Aquaris
dialog: Uh... I mean...

name: KongMing
dialog: Since Aquaris has nothing else to do, let's go then.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Okay...

title: Crash
name: Ithil
dialog: Oh, Iron Fist. You look very alive~

name: Ithil
dialog: Aquaris, I never expected that you would come and train with me so soon.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Thank you. Now I'm ready for the new challenges!

name: Iron Fist
dialog: And I am here to thank you for the training.

name: Ithil
dialog: That wouldn't be necessary. I'd rather see if you have fully mastered what you've learned.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Thank you for your time. Let me show you my progress.

name: Aquaris
dialog: It's a good idea to come with Iron Fist. Ithil probably ignored me.
It's not the time to pop the bottles yet.
She could realize that you're here any time~

name: Aquaris
dialog: Stop talking!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Ithil will ignore me as long as I stay low.

name: Aquaris
dialog: But I'm still envious of Iron Fist and her wings~
Well, not everyone can fly. So I can understand that.
I was worried that she would feel unfit once she has these new gears... Don't know why I even bothered.

name: Aquaris
dialog: But, I think she is... going to crash!!!

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Senpai! Aquaris! Get out of there!!!
Huh?!! Ouch...
After getting hit by Iron Fist, I could barely make a sound.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Senpai, this surely proves that Murphy's law is true...

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Sorry, Senpai. Are you alright?

name: Iron Fist
dialog: I'll get you to Raphael at once! You're not going to die!
Don't... Bother...
I--- I just need a rest...

name: Ithil
dialog: Leave him alone. He is just shocked by the impact.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Really? If you need any assistance, please just tell me.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: It's all my fault. Senpai wouldn't be hurt if I control my balance...

name: KongMing
dialog: Have you already forgotten what I told you?

name: Iron Fist
dialog: I didn't!

name: Iron Fist
dialog: But... After all this, I doubt if I can really become someone who is reliable...

name: KongMing
dialog: It is true that it takes effort to master your new gears.

name: KongMing
dialog: But this isn't a valid reason for you to let go of your confidence.

name: KongMing
dialog: That will be a waste of effort for everyone who invested in you.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: That's not going to happen. I will get stronger and stronger!

name: Ithil
dialog: Then prove it!

name: Ithil
dialog: Since you're already here, a warm-up test should be nice~

name: Aquaris
dialog: Nooooo!!! Why can't you just ignore me!!!

title: Trouble Maker
name: Fenrir
dialog: Huh? Nobody answered my challenge?

name: Fenrir
dialog: Just as I predicted, you are all cowards!

name: Fenrir
dialog: I suggest you abandon the name of Yume and call yourself "Yokel Academy"! Hmph!
Fenrir, stop it! You've caused enough trouble.

name: Fenrir
dialog: Why should I listen to a nobody like you? Convince me with your fists first!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Senpai, she just called you a nobody...

name: Aquaris
dialog: But she actually had a point... I've never seen you on the battlefield...
Aquaris! This is not the best time to make jokes. Let's stop Fenrir first.

name: Aquaris
dialog: I don't think she can be reasoned with.

name: Aquaris
dialog: She won't stop until a proper opponent arrives.

name: Aquaris
dialog: I believe it will be easier to find her a challenger.

name: Fenrir
dialog: Hey! What are you mumbling about?

name: Fenrir
dialog: Why don't you just say it out loud like big kids?!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Senpai, she's offending you again.
She also offended you! Haven't realized this, or are you just not reacting?

name: Aquaris
dialog: I did hear what she said, but taking offense isn't really my style.

name: Aquaris
dialog: In that case, her words…are…useless.

name: Aquaris
dialog: This is getting old... this... Fenrir, she hungers for battle since she first entered the Academy.

name: Aquaris
dialog: At first, the students agreed to fight her, but after that, she didn't know how to stop.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Recently, five other students tried to stop her, but their efforts were in vain.

name: Aquaris
dialog: When I arrived, I only saw the defeated Discipline Members...

name: Aquaris
dialog: And Fenrir standing there, awaiting her next battle.

name: Aquaris
dialog: I suspect she would have me killed if I stayed there any longer.

name: Aquaris
dialog: It was a horrible experience I won't soon forget.
But we can't leave her here. She's already starting to harass innocent students...As a Discipline Member, I'm pretty sure it is your duty to keep this from happening...

name: Aquaris
dialog: I'm afraid I'm not fit for this battle, Senpai.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Oh! I still need to complete my patrol. See you later~
Wait! You don't have to run if you don't want to fight...
I wasn't counting on you to do that!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Wow! Thanks for the show of faith... Alright, I know what to do...

name: Ithil
dialog: So you will accept Fenrir's challenge?

name: Aquaris
dialog: Of course not. I just decided to just to complete my patrols more quickly to avoid Senpai...

name: Aquaris
dialog: Wait... President Ithil, why are you here?

name: Ithil
dialog: I just finished my duties at the Animal Welfare Club and overheard a commotion.
Finally, someone here to save the day!

name: Ithil
dialog: That Fenrir is like a wild dog that just keeps barking.

name: Fenrir
dialog: You, maid! I know you're one of those Valkyries.

name: Fenrir
dialog: Let's just skip the formalities and get to business. Today, I will tear off your annoying eye-mask.

name: Ithil
dialog: Take it if you can.
Ithil! Are you alright?

name: Ithil
dialog: ... I'm fine. Just need to recover from her last blow.

name: Fenrir
dialog: You took my strike and survived... Well done.

name: Fenrir
dialog: It's a pity that you still failed, though. There's only one person in this world who can defeat me...
Before Fenrir could finish, someone arrived in a hurry.

name: Valeera
dialog: Ithil! What happened?

title: Round 2
name: Valeera
dialog: How bad is it? Let me see your wounds.

name: Ithil
dialog: Don't worry, I just took a direct hit. Why are you here?

name: Valeera
dialog: After leaving the Animal Welfare Club, I heard fighting and hurried here to see what happened.

name: Valeera
dialog: Are you feeling any better now?

name: Ithil
dialog: Yes, thank you...

name: Fenrir
dialog: Hey, this sort of blow should mean nothing to you! Why do you act like you're on death's door?

name: Fenrir
dialog: I remember Valkyries being tougher.

name: Fenrir
dialog: But since you've recovered with the help of your teammate, let's start Round 2!
Fenrir! This is enough! You should leave now and lick your wounds.

name: Fenrir
dialog: Unlike you cowards, I won't turn down fun with some excuse about safety!

name: Valeera
dialog: I'm not a coward. I accept your challenge!

name: Fenrir
dialog: Wow~ I wasn't expecting a second challenger in an academy full of cowards.
Ithil tried to protest Valeera accepting Fenrir's challenge, but Valeera talked her down.

name: Valeera
dialog: Ithil, don't worry about me. (Takes Ithil's right hand)

name: Valeera
dialog: As a senior, I should set an example for the juniors.

name: Valeera
dialog: You might be better than me in combat, but don't forget my Attainment in defense magic~

name: Valeera
dialog: Who knows, maybe I can even win this.

name: Ithil
dialog: Okay... I believe in you, Valeera.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Wow... I never thought Valeera would volunteer to do this.

name: Aquaris
dialog: She's leaving the Tri-Losers Team.
...You're shameless...

name: Ithil
dialog: Aquaris. Maids should also be experienced fighters. Go and help Valeera.

name: Aquaris
dialog: What??? But she will kill me...

name: Fenrir
dialog: Now I'm fighting two at the same time? Perfect.

name: Aquaris
dialog: We're starting now?!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Senpai! Is it too late to write my will? I hope you can prepare some snacks for my funeral.

name: Valeera
dialog: Don't worry, you will live to eat those snacks.

name: Aquaris
dialog: (sighs) Okay!!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Senpai!! I'm still alive! It's a miracle!

name: Aquaris
dialog: I would like to thank the Academy for this huge honor, as well as the cherry tree at the gate!
I think you should thank Valeera first before starting your performance... She took a hit for you...

name: Ithil
dialog: Valeera, are you alright?

name: Valeera
dialog: Ouch... I think my bones are still intact…

name: Bruno
dialog: Woof!

name: Valeera
dialog: Stop that, Bruno! It's tickles…

title: Hidden Hobby
name: Aquaris
dialog: Rumpy and Bruno showed up! Now the Tri-Losers Team is complete!
Psychic and Mio? Did you overhear the fight?

name: Psychic
dialog: After Ithil and Valeera left, Bruno and Rumpy became upset.

name: Psychic
dialog: It was like they were trying to lead us somewhere.

name: Mio
dialog: Meow... She's a berserker.
That makes sense... Bruno and Rumpy are able to sense danger from far away, like a berserker's rage.
But no one could anticipate Fenrir's strange behavior after seeing Bruno.

name: Fenrir
dialog: Stop it, Fenrir! You cannot break character just because of this extremely cute dog!
In an effort to focus her mind, Fenrir slammed the ground with her great club and started to taunt the students.

name: Fenrir
dialog: Hey! Where's my next challenger? I hate waiting!

name: Mio
dialog: My turn.

name: Fenrir
dialog: Very well. Unlike those cowards, you have the courage to stand up against me...
Mio, wait a second.

name: Aquaris
dialog: She defeated Ithil and Valeera. How can you possibly expect to beat her?

name: Aquaris
dialog: I don't know if it's Rumpy giving you courage, but you have to admit that he won't help you out...

name: Rumpy
dialog: Meow!!! (I'm not useless!)

name: Mio
dialog: Meow... I wasn't planning to take Rumpy with me.

name: Rumpy
dialog: Meow?! Meow!

name: Psychic
dialog: I'll support Mio instead. Senpai, please take care of Bruno and Rumpy while we fight...

name: Aquaris
dialog: Judging from what I've seen, only Senpai, Bruno, and Rumpy haven't fought Fenrir...

name: Aquaris
dialog: Which means we've got us a second generation of Tri-Losers~
That's not a title I want to have!
If you want to stop her, don't encourage her to fight more!

name: Mio
dialog: Meow... Are you ready?

name: Psychic
dialog: Yes! It's a good chance for me to test my power~

name: Fenrir
dialog: Are you ready?! Let's get serious!!
Mio and Psychic became more and more exhausted as the round seemed to be coming to an end.
Before they could make their next move, Fenrir readied her next attack.

name: Rumpy
dialog: Meow!

name: Bruno
dialog: Woof!
Rumpy! Bruno! Come back!
Bruno jumped onto the stage, possibly in defense of his master.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Oh no! Bruno is going to get killed!

name: Aquaris
dialog: I can't watch!
But luckily, that didn't happen.
Fenrir froze in her tracks as soon as she saw Bruno. She dropped her club and held Bruno in her arms, even burying her face into his fur.

name: Fenrir
dialog: It's warmer than I thought.

name: Aquaris
dialog: What has happened? She's a dog lover?

name: Bruno
dialog: (whimper)

name: Psychic
dialog: Fenrir, please let go of him! He cannot breathe anymore...

name: Fenrir
dialog: Sorry, I should've noticed that. Can I hold him a little longer... maybe 10 seconds?

name: Psychic
dialog: Please don't. Bruno doesn't like you, and you will make it even worse if you don't stop...

name: Fenrir
dialog: Okay...

name: Fenrir
dialog: My heart is already taken with this lovely creature...

name: Valeera
dialog: Haha... Looks like Fenrir had a hard time pretending she doesn't like dogs~

name: Valeera
dialog: I suggest you stop being so aggressive. It might be easier to earn Bruno's friendship.

name: Fenrir
dialog: Tch... I won't stop doing what I should do just because you say so.

name: Fenrir
dialog: But... I think I can make an exception for Bruno...

name: Fenrir
dialog: Bruno, let me pet you some more!!!

title: Self Intro (embarrassing ver.)
name: Gambler
dialog: Tell me, what's the most important factor in winning a gamble?

name: Gambler
dialog: Better skills? Cheating? Wrong…

name: Gambler
dialog: The key factor is... Confidence!

name: Gambler
dialog: You need to believe that you're the dominator of this game!

name: Gambler
dialog: You need to believe that no one can defeat you!

name: Saint
dialog: Wonderful, you certainly demonstrated the old saying: "In the land of the blind, the one-eyed man is king".

name: Saint
dialog: I believe you're getting your reputation back during my absence...

name: Aquaris
dialog: That sounds very weird, is that some kind of accent I haven't heard before?
I think you should at least observe before making any conclusions.
Look at that empress-style costume... Maybe this is what she got from the journey.

name: Aquaris
dialog: But making herself an empress? That's ridiculous, and I don't believe that will help her win any followers on campus.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Besides, why isn't she even feel embarrassed after speaking so weirdly?
Shhh, I hope you remember that you cannot defeat her, so if she hears what you're saying...

name: Gambler
dialog: Saint!!! How are you back so soon? I thought it would take you longer to complete your mission.

name: Gambler
dialog: (Glances at Saint) Something looks different about you…

name: Saint
dialog: Tch, that was just an excuse for me to get out of the campus and search for the truth...

name: Saint
dialog: And now... I see everything.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Oh! I got it! Saint must have become paranoid during her trip!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Haha, never thought she would end up like this...
You never learn...

name: Gambler
dialog: Shut it! You know nothing about Saint!
But Saint stopped Gambler before she actually attacked Aquaris. She's going to take the honor herself.

name: Saint
dialog: Gambler, let me show you what I got during the trip.
Aquaris? Aquaris?! Are you still alive? Answer me!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Not... Dead... Yet...

name: Aquaris
dialog: But... I don't have the strength to get up right now... My muscles are weak as a pudding made by Sonya.
I take that as you're fine.
But Saint, what have you done to her exactly?

name: Gambler
dialog: Senpai, mind your position, the person standing in front of you is: The Queen Across the Sea, The Silver Queen, The Dragon Queen, The Princess That Was Promised, The Dragon's Daughter--- Saint
You know that's the description for another character who's not even in this game, right?

name: Gambler
dialog: Wait what?
Uh... Forget what I said, that's just something that popped into my head for no reason.

name: Saint
dialog: I just disabled her ability, but it's a temporary effect, she will recover soon.

name: Saint
dialog: But remember, this is a cruel world, it always wants to weed out the weak.

name: Saint
dialog: So I won't go easy on anyone who goes against me next time. Let's go, Gambler.

title: Paranoid?
dialog: Aquaris, how do you feel now?

name: Aquaris
dialog: I have recovered from pudding to black pudding!

name: Aquaris
dialog: The names are similar but they're actually two different foods~
Now she gets hungry again…
Aquaris, you should really go to Ithil to improve your timing.
This is when we should start to worry about Saint, not your stomach.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Senpai, since when did you become so responsible?

name: Aquaris
dialog: But since you mentioned her... Let's follow them secretly!
What?

name: Aquaris
dialog: You heard me~ I believe we will find out what happened to her if we get more information.
Well... I know it's efficient, but it's the kind of behavior only perverts would do.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Don't let others judge you! Besides, you're already a pervert in many students' opinions~
By the way, are we in the wrong direction? They just took another way…

name: Aquaris
dialog: It takes effort to tail a person... So I say let's go to Sonya's cafeteria to eat some rice cakes first.
Even if you say so, we don't look like we're tracking someone as we're walking in a large crowd.

name: Aquaris
dialog: That's not my fault, how can I foresee I would become this popular someday.

name: Aquaris
dialog: See, even Valeera and Ithil are here to help us out just because of how cute I am~
I still think it's because of the rice cakes... And thanks to you, we're losing track of Saint now.

name: Valeera
dialog: I know it might embarrass you, but Saint is right there. She's the only one here who would wear such a ridiculous crown.

name: Gambler
dialog: Now let's hear it from your future king, Saint the Great! You will not only share the honor of hearing from her, but also get an exclusive keychain for your obedience!

name: Saint
dialog: I hereby declare myself the rightful ruler of this land, and all you beneath me shall follow my banner and forge...

name: Valeera
dialog: Totally self-centered... Now I definitely believe she's become paranoid.

name: Valeera
dialog: I hope Ithil has a backup plan for this...

name: Saint
dialog: I have seen through the illusion and found out the truth. All the authorities you've experienced are but a lie.

name: Saint
dialog: And you should be thankful, as your only salvation has now returned.

name: Ithil
dialog: Paranoid? No, I think she's more like a fanatic cultist now.

name: Valeera
dialog: Even if she is behaving strangely, that's still a mean description...

name: Valeera
dialog: But I think it might because of the sword she's holding right now.

name: Aquaris
dialog: According to a book (that Ithil forced me to read) some ancient weapons will grow a consciousness and has a possibility to control its owner. Maybe the sword Saint's holding is a weapon like that.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Aquaris, maybe you should stop talking. That kind of theory would cause a panic!

name: Iron Fist
dialog: But I think taking the sword from Saint is worth a try.

name: Saint
dialog: Don't go too far, you are not qualified for this...

name: Saint
dialog: But despite your many insults and your horrid blasphemies, I'm ready forgive all, and more, to reward your services.

name: Aquaris
dialog: She sounds more like a cultist than ever before...

name: Gambler
dialog: Aquaris! Mind your words!

name: Saint
dialog: Don't get angry because some arrogant nobody who cannot do anything.

name: Saint
dialog: Everything you ever wanted will be offered if you but lay down your arms, and kneel to your divine empress.

name: Valeera
dialog: Iron Fist, what happened?

name: Ithil
dialog: Saint! What have you done to her!

title: The Greater Good
dialog: Aquaris became weak in the last fight just like this... Maybe Saint did this with the help of the sword.

name: Saint
dialog: Nice try... Maybe we underestimated you in the past.

name: Saint
dialog: Our conquest is inevitable, our ascension a matter of time. Let none who are wise deny our destiny.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Can you at least speak normally? I'm starting to doubt if we're even speaking the same language.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Most of us don't understand you at all!

name: Saint
dialog: Silence...

name: Saint
dialog: Iron Fist has some power, but to win a battle it takes more than just power.

name: Saint
dialog: Just like what happened before, she will submit once I take away her power.

name: Aquaris
dialog: I can vouch for that, I also became faint last time after she took my power away.

name: Aquaris
dialog: She just directly takes power away, even barbarians are more civil than that.

name: Saint
dialog: The ones of great ambition won't bother with such small trifles.

name: Saint
dialog: So I don't feel guilty at all.

name: Gambler
dialog: Saint, you've become so cool! Although I still don't understand what you're saying.

name: Ithil
dialog: This is too much, surrender your sword and give back Iron Fist's power!

name: Saint
dialog: The sword is right here, take it if you can.

name: Valeera
dialog: Ithil! How bad is the wound?

name: Ithil
dialog: Uh... I don't think it's serious.

name: Ithil
dialog: I never thought she could be stronger than both of us combined.

name: Saint
dialog: You are strong, but this is my turf now.

name: Aquaris
dialog: That was the only sentence I could understand in this whole story. It means no one can defeat her in her backstory.
Outstanding! You acted just like you're the only one who could understand that.

name: Saint
dialog: Very soon, you will come to understand that I'm your only salvation.

name: Valeera
dialog: That's not an acceptable attitude when you're trying to recruit.

name: Saint
dialog: You will soon get used to it.

name: Saint
dialog: But right now, it's time for me to leave.

name: Saint
dialog: And don't worry about your power, it will be returned soon.

name: Saint
dialog: So long.

name: Aquaris
dialog: Now she looks even more like a cultist leaving to start the next secret assembly.
Not long ago, Kratos and Fenrir invaded Yume Academy, and no one stood a chance when faced against the first Valkyrie.
When all seems bleak, Michael and Lucifer combined their powers, and Nephilim emerged from the crevice between Light and Darkness.
With the powers of Light and Darkness, Nephilim fought against Kratos and won...but Kratos was not defeated.
And now...their paths cross again.

name: Kratos
dialog: So this is the Secret Challenge they've been talking about?

name: Fenrir
dialog: Yes, at least that's what I heard from the weaklins on campus. If we can pass the challenge, we can get to know their secret.

name: Fenrir
dialog: Although these information would be useless to me, I think that might mean something to you...

name: Kratos
dialog: That's useless, there's no secret in this Academy I don't know... (mumbling)

name: Fenrir
dialog: Did you say something?

name: Kratos
dialog: Nothing... Do you know anything more about it?

name: Fenrir
dialog: Uh... Ahaha...

name: Kratos
dialog: If the intel is unclear like this, you don't need to come to me next time...

name: Fenrir
dialog: Fine... But I will let Turin tell me everything about this place later.

name: Kratos
dialog: Wait a minute, you said Turin told you about this?

name: Fenrir
dialog: Yup, name is Turin or something, pretty weird right? She even fights differently from the other weaklins and...

name: Kratos
dialog: Alright, let's go and see what this Secret Challenge is made of.

name: Fenrir
dialog: Just as I predicted, these obstacles won't be able to stop you.

name: Kratos
dialog: That's all? I remembered Yume defenses being tougher...

name: Fenrir
dialog: But even if they didn't regress, I don't think that will be a problem.

name: Kratos
dialog: Come on, we will find out the secret once after passing the next stage.

name: Lucifer

dialog: So bored so bored so bored so bored so bored!!!!!!!

dialog: All these scaredy-cats, dodging me everywhere I go! Why is it so hard to even find someone to challenge!

name: Fenrir
dialog: Urgh, it could literally be ANYBODY. Just let me give someone a good beating!

dialog: Oooh... and it looks very interesting! I've always wanted to see what a real castle looks like.

name: Vivian
dialog: Wow, the inside is bigger than I imagined.

name: Vivian
dialog: Uhh... Senpai...? Why are trembling with fear? Is there something dangerous in this castle?

name: Vivian
dialog: Could it be a floor that could crumble at any moment, a giant rolling stone, a trap full of spikes, or something like that...?

dialog: Eek!? This castle is inhabited by someone!?

name: Dracula

dialog: Hmm... mmm... oohhh...

name: Estel

name: Estel
dialog: Yume Academy is so, so big---

name: Estel
dialog: It's so, so incredible---

name: Estel
dialog: The buildings have been carefully designed.

name: Estel
dialog: In other words, if it were to all explode from a bomb at any angle... The wreckage would be beautiful.

dialog: I, Estel shall become the greatest bom… pyrotechnician in the future!

name: Estel
dialog: Senpai, Senpai, what's that?

name: Estel
dialog: Can I blow it up?

CapsuGirl's pet
Luvly?

dialog: Oh! It's so cute!

you would have to battle CapsuGirl for that. Whoever wins can get it.

name: Estel

name: Estel
dialog: Okay, I get it! Estel will be a good kid.

name: Estel
dialog: Why does this mysterious creature keep hovering over here?

name: Estel
dialog: Maybe she's lost? Estel is good at finding people who are lost.
Lost?

That is a bit strange…

name: Estel
dialog: Senpai, Senpai, should we go look for CappuGirl? It looks like it wants to lead the way.
Luvly hovered around my legs and tugged at the hem of my pants.
I see… Also, it's CapsuGirl.
Estel traveled unexpectedly fast.
I had originally thought she was in poor health.
Who would've thought… she's unexpectedly quick and agile.

name: Estel
dialog: Senpai, Senpai, you're so slow!

name: Estel
dialog: Just like mama and papa! If I were to run at full speed, I'd be far away, but then you guys wouldn't be able to keep up!

It was…
an expression of regret.

dialog: Mama and papa use to take Estel to play in the forest.

name: Estel
dialog: And then often... often there would be small children lost in the forest. That was also the time when I brought them back!

name: Estel
dialog: And then they would be crying loudly…

name: Estel
dialog: That's when I would take out my tiny fireworks to show them.

name: Estel
dialog: And they would suddenly --- suddenly stop crying!
I'm surprised, I thought she was just another naughty kid.

name: Estel
dialog: So if CapsuGirl cries later, I can also show her my fireworks!
That's okay… Just imagining it seems dangerous.
Or should I say, it's harder to imagine Estel caring for others?
Or even worse, imagining CapsuGirl crying...
But Estel's actually quite caring.

name: Estel
dialog: You're gonna pay if you think that I can only cause trouble!
Pay?

name: Estel
dialog: I'm gonna set explosive bombs in your dorm!

name: Estel
dialog: Ah! The person in that cave is…

select_text: What are you doing here?|Perhaps an explanation would be good?

in this barren rocky cave there was a bird nest.

name: CapsuGirl
dialog: If I leave… these babies will…

These are…

name: Estel
dialog: They're so cute!!

dialog: There's heavy magic in the atmosphere here, they're only able to survive because of the protection of the cave.

name: CapsuGirl
dialog: So I thought about creating a sustainable environment for them to survive and sent Luvly back to the academy to bring someone over to help.

name: CapsuGirl

but her pet.

dialog: Your pet is called Luvly? Luvly is so cute!

name: Estel
dialog: Senpai may not be of help, but I'm pretty good at this! Can I help?

name: Estel
dialog: When I was living with mama and papa, the neighbor who was really nice to me was a veterinarian!

name: Estel
dialog: I'm quite familiar with helping animals to survive!
A few minutes later…

dialog: Wow, it's unbelievable that this simple device was created in such a short time.

name: CapsuGirl
dialog: Now all we have to do is regularly come back to clean the device.

name: CapsuGirl
dialog: You're actually quite thoughtful.

name: Estel
dialog: It's nothing compared to what mama and papa can do. But at this level, Estel can do it too!

dialog: But my firework-making talent will forever be unmatched!

name: Estel

dialog: They are gentle and powerful!

name: Estel
dialog: Filter the bad and you will only have the good voices remaining!

"Why does their child never grow up?"
"Could she be… one of the legendary warrior girls?"
"If she can be used for research... Ah, they might have heard us."

"Estel, remember to venture further into the vast world."

name: Estel
dialog: Understood, mama!

name: Estel
dialog: I was just thinking about the past.

name: Estel
dialog: Mama and papa told Estel to become stronger so that Estel can protect what must be protected.

name: Estel
dialog: And CappuGirl!

name: Estel
dialog: Estel is sooooo happy!

dialog: Estel felt lonely when she was separated from mama and papa, but she is brave!

another hand stretched out at the same time towards her.

The moth in the dark abyss.

Senpai…

dialog: A---choo!
