name: Blair
dialog: that you'll never, ever leave me---

name: Blair
dialog: Because there would be no point living in this world without you. What's that look? You think I'm joking?

name: Blair
dialog: To me…... You are the most important to me!
Blair's a girl of many stories.
But what could this attachment be?
Perhaps it's like a duckling imprinting on the first person they see.
Although it can be a bit of a headache.

name: Blair
dialog: From your expression I can tell that it may be a bit hard for you to understand.
Like a bee to the blossom, a moth to the flame
You are the light upon the candlestick
It is an inescapable fate
in order to sustain this life.
That is why, my dear, precious, one and only Senpai, that it is important for me to be close to you.
Oh ---
We're outside Yume Academy.
But this route is also a shortcut to the Grand Library.
Oh right, Blair! You---
All I know is that she's a Girl
with exceptional power in battle.
But this exceptional power emerged from her past as an assassin.
But I don't know what her strength is against Chaos creatures.
But if I just ask about it out of the blue might seem a bit…

name: Blair
dialog: You! What are you planning to do to my dearest!
Roselle?
That is Roselle, right?
No, she's an infected Roselle.

name: Blair
dialog: Ha!
Wait! Don't hurt her!

name: Blair
dialog: Dear? What is your relationship to her, why can't I hurt her.
How do I explain it? We're all classmates?
You shouldn't harm your classmates.

name: Blair
dialog: What's that over there?
Chaos creatures. Coincidental.

name: Blair
dialog: And YOU want to hurt my dearest too?
Just now…
It happened so fast.
What impressive assassin skills.
I didn't even see what was going on yet.

name: Blair
dialog: Ah, did I scare you, dear?

name: Blair
dialog: Actually I could've killed it in a way way more elegant manner.

name: Blair
dialog: But I was scared it was gonna hurt you...

name: KongMing
dialog: That was...

name: KongMing
dialog: amazing.
Kong Ming, why're you here?

name: KongMing
dialog: Happened to pass by.

name: Blair
dialog: Ah, the annoying Girl has finally said something nice, but in front of my dearest, you can praise me even more, such as "oh, you are so gifted, Blair!"

name: KongMing
dialog: The person who hasn't said anything nice is you...

name: KongMing
dialog: Hah, Yume Academy has a gained a brat, but I guess we need you.

name: Blair
dialog: Such "sweet" words are harmless to me~ Only my dearest matters. Such lives like yours are meaningless to me.

name: KongMing
dialog: You are really a headache...

name: KongMing
dialog: Well then, take care of her, her "dearest" Senpai~
You sure you don't want to stay for the show?

name: Blair
dialog: Well then, dearest, let's continue the tour~

name: Blair
dialog: Does this count as a date? A date? Should be a date, right~
Ah, Senpai doesn't know yet.
The only purpose the old Blair lived for was to be an assassin.
I never believed in equality amongst living beings if one had to say there was any.
They would just get killed by me and I spared no lives.
But to the current Blair.
The purpose that I now survive for is to be with Senpai.
The last thing I want is death. Ironically, since I was the one who brought it upon others and yet I am the one afraid of it now.
But under only one circumstance will I accept death.

name: Blair
dialog: Until death will we part… No, even death cannot keep us a part.

name: Blair
dialog: I'm now excited for what's to come at Yume Academy with you, dear.
If Lady Luck exists in this world…
…I hope she hears my prayers.
I didn't want this to happen.
Why is this happening to me…

name: Teresa
dialog: Ha! You just fainted, didn't you?
…I didn't. Although I really want to if that's possible.
I really don't want to face reality.
If I close my eyes, I can pretend none of this is happening.

name: Teresa
dialog: Hey! You there! Eyes on the target!

name: Rogue
dialog: Say that to yourself. There's no other witness here.
Time: Sunday Morning
Setting: Church of Violence
Characters: Me and this Nun that came out of nowhere
Plot: The nun tied me up to a wooden stake so she can test her knife-throwing skills
…versus Rogue.
…The target is an apple on my head.
I'm pretty sure I read the same story in another novel…
Why are they gambling in Church?!
I thought this was a sacred place!
Sacred!

name: Teresa
dialog: Shut up! Why can't we gamble in Church? Are you looking down on Churches?
I'm looking down on gambling…
God, please help me.

name: Teresa
dialog: God won't help you. It's just me!
I would never understand how did someone like her become a nun.

name: Teresa
dialog: Here's my wager. Winners take all!

name: Rogue
dialog: You're pretty brave to wager this much.

name: Rogue
dialog: Did you forget what happened before?
…What do you mean?

name: Rogue
dialog: Ha, you agreed to help without knowing anything?
I didn't agree to any of this, I was kidnapped!

name: Rogue
dialog: Teresa loses almost every gamble. You're such a good friend to agree to help her with this.
Please tell me this is not real.
Two hours later.

name: Rogue
dialog: You're actually good…or this one here is very lucky.
Hmmph! (Muffled)

name: Teresa
dialog: This apple is skilled at dodging knifes.
Hmmph! ("You're just bad at this! Just stop!")
I am surrounded by sharp blades…I don't dare to move a muscle in case I hurt myself.

name: Rogue
dialog: Alright, Teresa, I'll be off. I need to help Librarian with her books.
Can you please free me before leaving? And why are you helping Librarian?

name: Rogue
dialog: I'm not a sore loser, and I lost to Librarian. She's good. Very good.
Good…at Gambling? Is this the same Librarian that I know?

name: Teresa
dialog: Helping Librarian? Count me in!
You seem to look up to Librarian.

name: Teresa
dialog: Of course, who wouldn't? I won't waste my breath on explaining, since I don't plan on looking up at you anytime soon.
Watching them leave, all I wanted to say was:
I don't mind if you don't free me,
I also won't mind not knowing why do you like Librarian that much,
And it's also okay for me if you just leave me here.
But why you decide to gag my mouth before you lea---
At least let me cry for help!
In the end,
it was Uriel who freed me.
If possible,
I don't want to meet Teresa again. Ever.
...Hmm?
Am I seeing what I think I'm looking at…?
Nah, I must be seeing things.
Let me just close the door and open it again, I'm sure everything will go back to normal…

name: KongMing
dialog: What do you think you're doing, Senpai?
Oh, it's Kongming. Good morning!

name: KongMing
dialog: Good morning! You look hyper today!
Well, hyper-ventilating would be the correct word. Why is SHE here?
That person
sitting on the sofa
what's her name again?
Was it Teresa?

name: KongMing
dialog: Oh, you must be talking about Teresa. Uriel wrote a letter of recommendation for her. She used to be in charge of the Church of Violence, and seems alright.
The Church of Violence?
Is this even legal?

name: KongMing
dialog: I did remember Uriel talking about you being close. Why don't you show her around Campus?
Well, that IS what I do for newcomers...though I feel like I might need to talk to Uriel about the definition of "close" later.

name: KongMing
dialog: Ah, so you're more than close?
With whom?

name: Teresa
dialog: You can say that. We did meet each other in a life or death situation after all. So you're Senpai? Show me around the Campus then, like a good Senpai should.
More like a situation that almost caused me to lose my life, I'd say.

name: KongMing
dialog: Glad to see you two getting along. Now off you go, I have other Student Council matters to deal with.
Sure, sure, President KongMing. By the way, Teresa, don't tie me up this time.

name: Teresa
dialog: Of course!
I don't get her.
Where do we start…
Usually, I'd show the newcomer the Main Street.
But nothing good happened when I did that.
I'll start from the Library this time.
As the saying goes, "Books are the ladder of human progress." So we're heading for the Library first.

name: Teresa
dialog: I never heard that before. Are you sure you didn't make that up?
I'm pretty sure I read that somewhere. What will you know anyway? You probably don't read at all.

name: Teresa
dialog: I feel insulted. While I won't call myself a bookworm, I do read. Quite a lot.

name: Teresa
dialog: You see, I always wanted to chat with Librarian, and the topic of books will inevitably come up sometime, right?
What's with this girl and Librarian?

name: Teresa
dialog: Hmm, such a rich aroma…

name: Teresa
dialog: What are you looking at? Can't you smell the fragrance in the air?
Uh, no?

name: Teresa
dialog: …It's wine! Of the highest quality! Here I come! (Running towards the Main Street)
And an alcoholic too. How surprising.

name: Teresa
dialog: Hmm…do you want some? You sure need loosening up a bit.
…I'll pass. It's just…not everyone takes wine with Spicy Fishies. I'm impressed.

name: Teresa
dialog: Don't be, you're getting me embarassed. Now loosen up a bit, have some wine.
Sure, but do you mind telling me why can't you buy wine like everyone else does?
Why do you have to gamble for it, and why did you wager MY labor?

name: Teresa
dialog: You see, I don't have anything else to wager, that's why.
I can't start a fight with a girl, I can't start a fight with a girl…

name: Teresa
dialog: But you just did to the shop owner?
I had no choice.
You lost a year and a half's worth of my labor there.
I feel so guilty now.

name: Teresa
dialog: Where else do you want to show me? I'm starting to feel like I might like this place after all.
I sincerely hope the shop owner won't complain to KongMing about me…

name: Teresa
dialog: Oh, stop thinking about it. Here, have some Spicy Fishies, they are my favorite.
Easy to say when you're the one that caused all this.
I really don't get what Teresa is thinking.

name: Teresa
dialog: Oooh, a Sunglasses Fair! Yume Academy is full of pleasant surprises, I must admit.

name: Teresa
dialog: Don't go anywhere, I'll be back in a bit.
Annnd off she goes.
A few moments later

name: Uriel
dialog: Hello, Senpai. Why are you counting ants on the ground?
Hello, Uriel. Mind telling me why did you say that I was "close" with Teresa?

name: Uriel
dialog: Teresa? She's a very kind person. Did she make you angry?
…Define "kind".

name: Uriel
dialog: Well, she DID help fixing the collapsed houses of the Church…
…the ones that she helped breaking?

name: Uriel
dialog: And she always shared her favorite snack with others…
…which was way too spicy and caused other girls to have stomach aches?

name: Uriel
dialog: …And many others. Look, Senpai, she has many redeeming features!
I find them rather hard to notice, especially when she tied me up in the past…

name: Uriel
dialog: Well, Teresa can be infuriating at times, and she really need to hone her social skills, but she is kind at heart. Some practice, and she'll be as good as everyone else. Alright, I need to be at somewhere else. See you later~
Uriel left.
Without convincing me of
Teresa's kindness.
Does it even exist?

name: Teresa
dialog: Senpai! Look at me. Don't I look cool in these sunglasses?
Her smile is blinding. I almost missed the angry person coming this way…are they holding a weapon?
Wait, isn't this the supervisor of the Sunglasses Fair?
What did you do???

name: Teresa
dialog: Now that was fun.
I don't want to do this again. Paying for that really hurts my wallet.

name: Teresa
dialog: Come on, Senpai! Don't tell me you didn't have fun after "exercising"!
You call that exercise?

name: Teresa
dialog: Come on, don't be a killjoy.
You're killing all my joy…

name: Teresa
dialog: Don't be this way. Do you know how the Church of Violence came into being?
Good question, I do want to know how.

name: Teresa
dialog: Well, here's how things went. One of our friends had a nervous breakdown…
That was a very encouraging start.

name: Teresa
dialog: …so did Uriel and the others. Everyone was so sad…

name: Teresa
dialog: But they're still alive. They have the chance to make a difference.

name: Teresa
dialog: People come to the Church to confess everyday. They are either depressed, or stressed out, or both.
Her tone was light, but…
…her expression was glum.

name: Teresa
dialog: Just praying to God won't changing anything.

name: Teresa
dialog: They just don't understand…

name: Teresa
dialog: …The only one who can change them are themselves.

name: Teresa
dialog: Uriel was always so self-critical. It wasn't her fault at all…I couldn't stand to see my loved ones like that.

name: Teresa
dialog: I am a nun. Nun Teresa. A nun has her responsabilities, but I tend to lose patience when fulfilling them.

name: Teresa
dialog: I read from a book that others will feel your kindness if you shared what you like with them.
And the Spicy Fishies incident happened?

name: Teresa
dialog: And then I remembered another book saying that everything comes at a price, so I asked them to give me something in return for the Fishies…
…Just when I was impressed by your thoughtfulness.

name: Teresa
dialog: Fighting over talking, that's how you get close to others!
That's how you get yourself in the Infirmary. Raphael won't be glad when she learns about this…

name: Teresa
dialog: Therefore, let's fight!
…What did you say?

name: Teresa
dialog: Let's have a heart-to-heart! With our fists!
Nooooooooo!

name: Teresa
dialog: How about now? Don't you feel better now?
…So all you wanted…was to make me happy?

name: Teresa
dialog: You seemed pretty down.
That's why she acted this way…

name: Teresa
dialog: Do you feel better now?
…Yes.
It's just like what Uriel said: Teresa is a very kind person.
Though she does need to learn more social skills.

name: Teresa
dialog: Now that Senpai finally smiled,

name: Teresa
dialog: I need to spread the happiness! First step to doing that would be creating a Fight Club to help others too!
Did I smile?
She seems alright after all…Wait a minute, what did she just say?
KongMing, I don't feel good about this…not a bit…
Yume Academy is peaceful as usual today.
I'm the Senpai of the Girls in the Academy.
And judging from the bandages on my body,
you can totally tell how "great" I feel right now! I'm currently in Raphael's infirmary getting treated!
And the disaster-of-it-all is now talking "happily" with KongMing.

name: Frexie
dialog: Hi there! My name is Frexie! I'm here to see Lucifer, please do tell her that I've been a huge fan!!!

name: Angelica
dialog: You mentioned Luna right? Can I find her here?

name: KongMing
dialog: Can you let us finish the statement first?

name: KongMing
dialog: Who knocked him first?

name: Frexie
dialog: Wut...?

name: Angelica
dialog: I beg your pardon?

name: Frexie
dialog: Oh, you're still talking about the crash. But we've brought him here already.

name: Angelica
dialog: Oh, about him. Is he still alive?

name: KongMing
dialog: Raphael, please hold him down. We can't let him get up.

name: KongMing
dialog: So, when Senpai was taking a walk, Miss Frexie rushed out from nowhere and knocked him far ahead.

name: KongMing
dialog: And after a few hundreds meters of "flight", Senpai took a hard landing on the ground and passed out. Then Angelica found him and took him to the infirmary, correct?

name: KongMing
dialog: Please say something I can understand.

name: Raphael
dialog: Senpai is not able to speak properly right now. The brain concussion made him too dizzy.

name: KongMing
dialog: So I ask you not do this again. Rushing at full speed everywhere can be extremely dangerous. You can only do that on the field.

name: Raphael
dialog: That explains Senpai's brain concussion. But the serious bruise, however, might be caused by something else. It looks like someone dragged Senpai's body all the way here.

name: Angelica
dialog: Oh, I thought Senpai was dead. Besides, the body is too big to be hung on my bow, so I had no other choice.

name: KongMing
dialog: (These two are mindless.)

name: Raphael
dialog: (They really need to be more mindful.)

name: Raphael
dialog: Senpai! Please calm down, getting agitated is bad for your recovery.

name: KongMing
dialog: Apart from having nine lives, he's really not that smart.

name: Raphael
dialog: If you really need to say things like this, please leave it after Senpai is fully recovered...
I am their Senpai
And this is Yume Academy.
I'm totally "fine"
And I'm "not" getting angry
If you're listening, please don't worry about me.

name: KongMing
dialog: Why do you look so upset?

name: KongMing
dialog: They've already apologized for what they've done. Now it's time for you to behave like a real Senpai and show them around the campus.

name: Frexie
dialog: She's got a point. I've apologized for knocking you over. Now it's your turn to apologize to me for being too tiny to notice and then I'll mercifully accept your apology.
Mercifully?

name: Angelica
dialog: I'm very sorry, Senpai. I should not have naively decided that there was no longer hope, even if you did look like you were dead at the time. I really should have hit you again to see if you were still alive and I will take care to do this in the future.
That's more like making a second kill!!!

name: KongMing
dialog: See, they've already apologized. You should forgive them.
Listen carefully. YOU CANNOT CALL THAT AN APOLOGY!

name: KongMing
dialog: You might as well put up with it. So now it's time for you to show the new girls around campus, like you always do.
I'm really starting to regret taking on this job.
By the way, do you have any insurance or anything? I really need to prevent myself from ending up in the infirmary for a second time.

name: KongMing
dialog: Don't worry, you won't be harmed again... most likely. Maybe you can ask Raphael to come with you?

name: Raphael
dialog: Sorry, Senpai. But as you see, there're other patients, so I cannot leave my infirmary that easily.
Fine, I refuse to show them around.

name: KongMing
dialog: Unfortunately, you cannot refuse this order, Senpai. Otherwise you might find Frexie "helping" you out during the anniversary celebration.
I'm the Senpai of the Girls in the Academy.
And I have this feeling
The peace of this beautiful academy
Is about to be broken
Please don't get any closer.

name: Frexie
dialog: But seriously? If you go any further, I might miss sight of you again!

name: Angelica
dialog: She's got a point, Senpai, we might lose visual of you if you are too far away.
We're just two meters away!!! What are you talking about?!

name: Nona
dialog: Senpai! Help!!!
Hey! Stop, slow down before you knock me over---

name: Nona
dialog: Senpai! The cart containing the balloons for the anniversary celebration is broken. Now the balloons have all gone!
Why is that so urgent? I think you still have enough time to prepare some more balloons.

name: Nona
dialog: Well, considering the importance of the anniversary. We used Sivney's inflator...

name: Nona
dialog: Apparently it has some other effects and now the balloons we've lost, have become living creatures...
That sounds horrible...

name: Nona
dialog: A problem also occurred while decorating the haunted house!!!
What? Do you really think that's appropriate in an anniversary event?

name: Nona
dialog: Well, we adjusted the settings, so it won't be scary anymore!
Hmmmm, then it can't be called a haunted house anymore. But why should I care anyways?

name: Nona
dialog: I also told KongMing about this. But she said she's too busy to help, so I came to you.
But as you can see... I'm not available either. I'm showing the new girls around.

name: Nona
dialog: Hmmmm, is it possible to let them help us out?

name: Frexie
dialog: Woah! Are you serious? Count me in!

name: Angelica
dialog: I think this will help me get to know the academy way more!
Oh, lord. Not again.
If you want to punish me, please find another way.
What’s that?

name: Nona
dialog: You mean the balloons flying in the sky?
Well... If you insist on calling them "balloons".
If they're meant to be balloons...
They're not meant to pull funny faces...
Or laugh...
And why do they even have teeth?!
Another nonsensical invention...

name: Nona
dialog: No matter what, the problem we're currently facing are these balloons.
It sounds more problematic when I have to deal with this...
A beautiful orange balloon smiles. How sweet...
If it can hide its sharp teeth.

name: Orange Balloon
dialog: (Rawr~)
The purple ones look harmless... Until it noticed me staring and turned black with anger.
If Sivney can use her talent properly, perhaps the Chaos could’ve been eradicated a long time ago…
Are these really balloons?! Now they're spitting daggers!

name: Nona
dialog: Senpai, what should we do?
I don't know.

name: Angelica
dialog: Let me handle this.

name: Angelica
dialog: It won't matter if I destroy them right?
Wow, you sound really reliable right now.

name: Angelica
dialog: I've once saw some evil faces in the sky before too...

name: Angelica
dialog: Not a fan---
Angelica fires.
You should give us a warning before you do that.
But great shot! You even got one of them!

name: Angelica
dialog: I've seen this scene once before… it is quite saddening…

name: Angelica
dialog: Even when darkness came, you could still see the light of expression of those who knew what occurred as it was truly blinding.

name: Angelica
dialog: Luna…
The only thing that was blinding was the sudden firing of you arrow.
Talking so seriously about something nonsensical and still doing something unimaginable…

name: Angelica
dialog: Oh... My Luna...
I don't know how to reply, but...
She looks really sad.
Anyways, no time to mind Angelica... where's Frexie?!!
Has anyone seen Frexie?

name: Nona
dialog: Oh, she rushed to the haunted house.
Can we expel Frexie right now?

name: Nono
dialog: AHHHHHH!!!
Was that from the haunted house?

name: Nona
dialog: This can't be good, we'd better go take a look.
I'm coming with you...

name: Nono
dialog: Hey, stay with me!!!
Of course, it's Frexie. She's passed out... Looks like she won't recover anytime soon.
It might not be nice to say this,
but I have the urge to say it anyways.
What happened to this stupid idiot?

name: Nono
dialog: We mentioned about the surprises we had inside and she rushed in...

name: Nono
dialog: before we could even finish telling her what was exactly inside,
Surprises...?

name: Angelica
dialog: You mean scary surprises?
She doesn't look like the type of person who's afraid of ghosts.

name: Nona
dialog: I thought she would enjoy it and was the reason she rushed inside.

name: Angelica
dialog: I thought she might’ve wanted to get some inspiration out of the haunted house since I noticed her notebook filled with joke ideas once.

name: Nona
dialog: So she must have misunderstood... After the adjustment, the facility is no longer scary, but extremely dangerous.
To be honest, I don't think she's capable of completing any one of the jokes in her notebook. That's beyond her.
And... extremely dangerous?

name: Nona
dialog: Well... We applied the machines developed by Sivney to set up the surprises. We thought it might come in handy.

name: Nona
dialog: But as it turns out. The surprises appeared to be too powerful. It could cause lethal damage to humans.

name: Nona
dialog: So the haunted house is now totally not suitable for the anniversary celebration.

name: Nona
dialog: But if someone can provide us enough information, we might still have a chance to fix it...
...I think you just shouldn't use the tools developed by Sivney.

name: Frexie
dialog: Oh, is it morning already?
And the idiot awakes---

name: Frexie
dialog: I remember I passed out after sensing a strange power!
You need to find a better excuse next time if you are found in a coma at the front gate of a haunted house.

name: Nona
dialog: So what shall we do with the haunted house?
I think the best solution is to send down a volunteer to check it out. Frexie, do you want to check it out?

name: Frexie
dialog: What?
Please explore the unknown space for us?

name: Frexie
dialog: Do you mean I have to face that again? I don't want to see that ugly clown face again---
So she's not refusing because of danger?
Now I'm starting to wonder how ugly that clown face is.

name: Nona
dialog: Frexie, but I think you should try again... We got the best tricking trap hidden inside!

name: Nona
dialog: If you can check it out and learn how it works, you will be one step closer to be crowned of the queen of jokes!

name: Frexie
dialog: Well, I reckon the clown's face isn't that ugly after all. Here I go!
That was easy. At least we got our lab rat for the test.
I cannot tell how dangerous it is.
But judging from the sound of Frexie screaming...
She did not have a pleasant experience
And for safety sake, we didn't walk in to check it out.

name: Frexie
dialog: Howdy...
You look pale. Do you need a rest?

name: Frexie
dialog: Don't worry. I'm da best......
BAM!
She passed out and hit the ground again...

name: Nono
dialog: We need to send her to the infirmary asap!

name: Raphael
dialog: It's not a big problem. She just passed out because of the shock. Her body wasn't hurt at all. But I thought airheads were tougher, so what did she experience?
I hope we won't ever have to know. But thanks to her, Nona finally decided to close the haunted house.
What a day...

name: Angelica
dialog: Yume Academy... This is really a nice place.
Oh, Angelica, you're still here?

name: Angelica
dialog: Yes, I'm worried about you.
Sorry for leaving you halfway...

name: Angelica
dialog: Don't worry about it. I did enjoy myself and I'm pretty relieved to know that Luna also lives in such a peaceful place.
(I'm really curious about her story with Luna, but it's not the best time to ask her about it...)

name: Angelica
dialog: What a nice day...
Oh, she's awake?

name: Raphael
dialog: Not really. I gave her a dose of tranquilizer, she needs more rest after staying in a room full of Sivney's invention for such a long time.

name: Frexie
dialog: Yume Academy... <@%#...
What did she say?

name: Raphael
dialog: Something like conquer Yume Academy? I'm not so sure.

name: Raphael
dialog: Oh, the party is about to begin.
You mean the anniversary evening party?

name: Raphael
dialog: Yes, but I'm afraid Frexie won't be able to enjoy that. She's still unconscious.

name: Angelica
dialog: Why don't we pour a cup of ice water over her to wake her up?
You've got an evil side too, don't you?

name: Raphael
dialog: I think she just lacks common sense.
But I actually feel sorry for Frexie as she cannot catch up to the party.

name: Frexie
dialog: <*!... After taking out Senpai, I'll become number one in Yume Academy!!!

name: Raphael
dialog: What's the logic in that?
Okay, I don't feel sorry anymore.
At least the academy is still peaceful as usual today.
That's good news.
